ing: 1/2 cup ice cubes, or as desired
des: "Capeta, which means devil in Portugese, is the name of this Carnival must-have drink, very popular in northern Brazil. This calls for guarana powder, which comes from a berry grown in Brazil and Venezuela; you can find it sold in health food shops as an energy supplement."
ins: Place ice, sweetened condensed milk, vodka, cinnamon, honey, guarana powder, and cocoa powder in a blender; blend until smooth.
